prompt_tiers.tier1: The user wants to test the system.
prompt_tiers.tier2: The user's message 'Test' is a simple test to check if the system is functioning correctly and responding to input.

response_tiers.tier2: I received your test message and am responding as expected.  This confirms that the system is functioning correctly and able to process your input.  I'm ready for further instructions.
response_tiers.tier3: The system has successfully received and processed your test message.  This indicates that all communication channels are open and functioning as intended.  I am prepared to assist you with any further requests or tasks.
